item.description:
I thought it would be fun to go tube sliding at ward hill ski area in Shrewsbury Ma
2 hours of tubing is 22.00 dollars. Tubing here is great as you dont have to walk back up the hill..We can hit a restaurant if if interested. I was thinking ruby tuesdays in Worcester ma wold be good. Make suggestions where you would like to go. If not interested in tubing maybe you could meet for lunch.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at tube ticket booth wearing a black and white jacket
item.name: Ward Hill Tubing
